subject: Day Of Love
text:
He begged me to come
 back to him
 He promised me things
 that never did come true.
 And once again he broke my
 heart into two.
 Now I wonder why he walked
 away, why he couldn't stay.
 When he left he took my heart and
 left his memory.
 This day of love turned out to be
 A day for crying.
